data.name: CompositeSnapshotStrategy_AtLeastOneStrategyMustBeProvided
data.value: At least one strategy must be provided.

data.name: Encryption_FailedToDeserializeEncryptedDataEnvelope
data.value: Failed to deserialize encrypted data envelope.

data.name: Encryption_NoProviderCanDecrypt
data.value: No registered provider can decrypt this data. The encryption key may have been removed.

data.name: Encryption_ReadOnlyEventStore
data.value: Event store is in read-only mode. Writes are not permitted during this encryption migration phase.

data.name: Encryption_ReadOnlyProjectionStore
data.value: Projection store is in read-only mode. Writes are not permitted during this encryption migration phase.

data.name: EventSourcedRepository_AggregateIdCannotConvertToNullString
data.value: Aggregate ID cannot convert to null string.

data.name: EventSourcedRepository_DeleteRequiresTombstoneFormat
data.value: Delete operation requires a tombstone event implementation. Override DeleteAsync in a derived repository class for aggregate {0}.

data.name: EventSourcedRepository_FindRequiresExecutorFormat
data.value: Find operation requires a query executor implementation. Override FindAsync in a derived repository class or inject an IQueryExecutor<{0}>.

data.name: EventSourcedRepository_QueryRequiresExecutorFormat
data.value: Query operation requires a query executor implementation. Override QueryAsync in a derived repository class or inject an IQueryExecutor<{0}>.

data.name: EventVersionManager_EventTypeCannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: Event type cannot be null or empty.

data.name: EventVersionManager_NoUpgradePathFoundFormat
data.value: No upgrade path found for {0} from version {1} to {2}.

data.name: EventVersionManager_NoUpgradersRegisteredFormat
data.value: No upgraders registered for event type {0}.

data.name: EventVersionManager_UpgraderAlreadyExistsFormat
data.value: An upgrader for {0} from version {1} to {2} already exists.

data.name: SizeBasedSnapshotStrategy_MaxSizeMustBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: Maximum size must be greater than zero.

data.name: TimeBasedSnapshotStrategy_IntervalMustBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: Interval must be greater than zero.
